automaticUser.title: Automatically detect logged in user information
automaticUser.description:
For developers: This works by iterating through all of the properties on the window object, looking for any with an email property. So for example, this detection would work if you had the following somewhere in your appâ€™s code:
window.user = {
  id: 'a1b2c3d4',
  email: 'user@email.com'
  name: 'First Last'
  created: '2015-09-26T22:49:13.124Z'
};
Uncheck this option to manually specify which exposed property to use.
